The kind of sacrifice that is praised [a: The kind of sacrifice where cattle, goats and sheep, chickens and pigs, and various kinds of animals are not slaughtered
A regular gift as an ongoing family sacrifice
The benefits of sacrificing with a mind: Rebirth in a happy, pleasing world
